title: Melina Haze Torres
content: Melina was born April 6, 2009, in Quincy, a daughter of Alex and Karen L. Roberts Torres, both of Quincy. Melina was in the first grade at Liberty Grade School. Melina was always writing special notes, coloring and doing arts and crafts. She loved playing with her older sisters, and helping her mom with housework. In addition to her parents, survivors include Melina's two sisters, Genesis and Aiyana Torres; her maternal grandmother, Julie Roberts-Cole of Barry; and her paternal grandmother, Luz Torres, of Brooklyn, N.Y.; many aunts, uncles and cousins also survive. SERVICES: 11 a.m. Wednesday, May 25, at Duker and Haugh Funeral Home, conducted by the Rev. Paul Kinney. Interment will be in Greenmount Cemetery. VISITATION: 4 to 7 p.m. Tuesday, May 24, at the funeral home. MEMORIALS: Education Fund for Genesis and Aiyana Torres. WEBSITE: dukerandhaugh.com. ARRANGEMENTS: Duker and Haugh Funeral Home. Condolences may be expressed online at whig.com.
